post.body: Tree watered. Thanks for pressies, we'll open when I get home! Needles everywhere btw.
Weirder still, it's only the location link on your LJ that goes there! A regular map search goes to actual Lincolnshire.
Not sure what Google Maps found on your iPhone, but here it's pointing at Nocturnal Dominion in Chicago.
Ah. Bit of a U&F preview, then? Good stuff...
Tell me you didn't get lost in one of those out-of-time Hammer House of Horror villages. Or tell me you did. Either way.
Ah. Old school, then.
OK, that's bizarre- I google "pho", it gives me three results and then points me at Photobucket.
I is ded of Christmas lurgy. Yay! Urgh.
Already singing "We'll follow the old man" in my head. I'm so "White Christmas"-whipped.
Right. I'd better get that sheepbit cooking.
Fairytale of New York. The only Christmas song worth listening to. Kick Santa in the bollocks and hug your dearest close.
Oven still stinks of useless oven cleaner. Problematic when trying to cook dinner.
Wow, that was pointless. I might as well have washed the oven out with bubble bath.
Enough procrastinating. Time to clean the oven.
(Calm, calm... /snarkyphotographer)
OK... Just saw a flash go off from the exterior balcony at St Paul's Cathedral. What the hell will that illuminate? All of London?
... I'm frightening myself, now.
If he used to fit through your chimney, I'm sure he can get in over the internet instead. Which probably means he's @warrenellis.
Hide, children. He knows if you've been naughty. And there's still space in that sack.
All these Santas. All these jolly fat men with murder in their eyes and oddly-shaped objects in their sacks.
